text.text: The Last Day! Welcome Europe, Middle East, and Africa! :earth_africa:
Today is the last day of the course, but the adventure doesn't stop here! Read on to find out how to stay connected with the Galaxy Community
Choose Your OWN Schedule Today! And feel free to ask us for recommendations for tutorials if you are interested in a particular topic.
Don't forget to check the *FAQ document* in each channel's description (at the top of the screen on desktop)

When asking a question:
1. Use threads
2. Say which server (<https://usegalaxy.org.au|.org.au>, <https://usegalaxy.eu|.eu>, or <https://usegalaxy.org|.org>) you're using.
3. Share all of the details (what did the tool say? what was the error? did you see more information in the bug-report icon?)

*Today*
This is the final day of all the teachers being here all of the time, so ask your questions! Don't be afraid to ask! There is some information at the end of the program about certificates and a feedback survey

*Tomorrow*
The instructors will be taking some much needed rest :sleeping:

*The next few days*
We'll be sending you a survey (also linked to from the last item in the program).  We need your feedback! Was this week useful to you? Say thank you by filling it out. :pray: :wave:

Instructors might be around, but, less so than before. Feel free to keep using Slack, but you can also ask any training quesions in the <https://gitter.im/Galaxy-Training-Network/Lobby|GTN Gitter Channel>, or the <https://help.galaxyproject.org/?utm_source=smorgasbord&utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=smorgasbord2021|Galaxy Help Forum>.

*The Future*
Did you not have time to do everything you wanted to? There's a rumour parts of this event might happen again during <https://www.vibconferences.be/events/gcc2021-virtual-edition| the Galaxy Community Conference during the summer>. :shushing_face:

*Community*
Enjoying Galaxy? Want to become part of the community? Check out <https://youtu.be/-1MPdxmRs8U|the community video> and join us!

*Community Fora*
1. GalaxyProject Home: https://galaxyproject.org
2. Galaxy servers: <https://galaxyproject.org/use/?utm_source=smorgasbord&utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=smorgasbord2021|Find a Galaxy server near you>!
3. Galaxy Training Network: <https://training.galaxyproject.org/?utm_source=smorgasbord&utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=smorgasbord2021|Start learning Galaxy>
4. Support: <https://help.galaxyproject.org/?utm_source=smorgasbord&utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=smorgasbord2021|Galaxy Help Forum>
5. Galaxy Publications: <https://www.zotero.org/groups/1732893/galaxy?utm_source=smorgasbord&utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=smorgasbord2021|Zotero>
6. Galaxy Communities: <https://galaxyproject.org/community/?utm_source=smorgasbord&utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=smorgasbord2021|Find and Join a community>
7. Events: <https://galaxyproject.org/events/?utm_source=smorgasbord&utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=smorgasbord2021|Galaxy Event Horizon>
8. Galaxy Working Groups: <https://galaxyproject.org/community/wg/?utm_source=smorgasbord&utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=smorgasbord2021|Find and join a WG>
9. GitHub: <https://github.com/galaxyproject?utm_source=smorgasbord&utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=smorgasbord2021|galaxyproject>
10. Gitter Chat: <https://gitter.im/galaxyproject/Lobby?utm_source=smorgasbord&utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=smorgasbord2021|Start talking with the Galaxy Community!>
11. GTN Gitter: <https://gitter.im/Galaxy-Training-Network/Lobby?utm_source=smorgasbord&utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=smorgasbord2021|Join the training discussion here!>
12. PaperCuts: <https://galaxyproject.org/events/2021-02-papercuts/?utm_source=smorgasbord&utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=smorgasbord2021|Monthly Collaboration Fest>
13. GTN CoFest: <https://github.com/galaxyproject/training-material/issues/1712?utm_source=smorgasbord&utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=smorgasbord2021|Everybody Welcome!>
14. Twitter: follow <https://twitter.com/galaxyproject|@galaxyproject>, <https://twitter.com/gxytraining|@gxytraining>
15. Video: <https://youtu.be//-1MPdxmRs8U|Watch it on YouTube>
16. <https://shiltemann.github.io/global-galaxy-course/workshop|Ask an instructor> - Have question about the training? Did you run into a problem? Just wanna chat? Ask away on Slack!
